name: Revenge Of Jack Brown
description:
After a horrific expedient, Jack Brown valued to seek revenge on the people that killed his family. While looking for a cure for cancer, he expediently turns himself into a werewolf. Unaware of his actions, he goes on a rage at night, killing all crooks. Or, does he?

W  -  Jump

A  -  Go left

D -  Go right

art BY eileen-lingad.itch.io
